# IEntityService interface

Provides a set of operations on an entity.

```csharp
public interface IEntityService
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [OpenEntityForm](IEntityService/OpenEntityForm.md)(…) | Opens the Entity form to modify an [`IEntity`](../Mendix.StudioPro.ExtensionsAPI.Model.DomainModels/IEntity.md). Returns true if modifications to the entity were saved successfully, false if user cancelled. |
